author: Ted
content: I seem to be channeling you. I just bought a new laptop: Like you I'm attached to an op system, largely because of my investment in Mac Software which I can't get to run on any PC. Add some Mac dedicated peripherals and, well, Steve Jobs finds an insidious way to build walls around its users. Someone is going to figger out how to run Mac OS. If Sony makes that break through... Apple could be in trouble.
